biography: Ricke, a male golfer, is considered to be retired from the Hector Trophée.
While his home club remains a mystery to the public, Ricke has marked his presence in the tournament's history by competing in two editions.
Despite his participation, Ricke has yet to clinch a Hector Trophée victory or an individual Victor trophy.

Known for his calm and collected demeanor on the course, Ricke's strategic play is as calculated as his fashion sense is understated. While some mistake his quiet confidence for aloofness, those who have the pleasure of knowing him understand it is merely the focus required to execute his game plan.
As of now, Ricke is not expected to participate in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025. However, the world of golf is ever-changing, and last-minute entries are always a possibility.
